name: CryptoNewsDaily
0:
”Alexa, Open Crypto News”
”Alexa, Launch Crypto News”
”Alexa, Crypto News”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: crypto news
des:
I needed a good way to keep up with blockchain and cryptocurrency news, so I created this skill that summarizes the top 10-ish stories via Inside.com. The stories are taken from numerous news outlets across the web. 

If you haven't subscribed, Inside.com is a great way to get daily news in your inbox and @jason is a great guy.

Contact: @hpduong



Disclaimer: I am considering an investment in Inside.com, but that is because I think the team and service really are great.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
